text: (annalil) aniyayakkararkal tankal campatitta (tiya)taip parri payantu kontiruppatai nir parppir; anal atu avarkal mitu nikalave ceyyum; anal evar iman kontu salihana (nalla) amalkal ceykirarkalo avarkal cuvarkkap punkavanankalil irupparkal; avarkal virumpiyatu avarkalutaiya iraivanitam kitaikkum. Atuve perum pakkiyamakum
